flawed_nl_solution:
Each dress takes 4 square meters of fabric to make, so the number of dresses she can make will be 56/4 = <<56/4=41>>41 dresses.
Each dress takes 3 hours to make, thus she will have to work 41 dresses x 3 hours/dress = <<41*3=123>>123 hours.
#### 123

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
